abesinhaidiri wasara thuna athulatha mahinda chinthana idiri dakma yatathe thawath mega wot 1500 ka widulibala dharithawak jathika widulibala paddhathiyata ek kirimata jathika widuli salasma yatathe idikirim katayuthu karagena yana bawa widulibala amathyanshaya kiyayi.mahinda chinthanaya yatathe pasugiya wasarawaladimerata jathika widulibala paddhathiyata mega wot 1665 ka widulibala dharithawak ekkara athayi da widuliyabala amathya pawithra wanniaarachchiya mahathmiya kiyayi.ejapaya norochchole gos ehi waradi sewwath 1994 ejapa palana samaya awasanaye merata widuli nishpadana dharithawa wuye mega wot 1409 ki.

ee aandukrama wyawasthawa sanshodhana magin kalina awashyathawalata galapena paridi sakaskota ganima asiru bawa pahadili wu bawini. 1972 nawa aandukrama wyawasthawa sampadanaya kirime pasubima ebandu wuwa da 1978 wana wita nawa aandukrama wyawasthawak sampadanaya kirimata tharam wu wyawasthamaya arbuda kisiwak nothibini. 1978 di nawa aandukrama wyawasthawak sampadanaya kirimata thududun ekama hethuwa wuye e. ja. pa. ye nayakaya wu che. aar. jayawardhana mahathage abhiprayayan itukara ganime awashyathawayi. 1970 mathiwaranayen e. ja. pa. labu antha parajaya hamuwe mathiwaranaya dushitha bawa ho thama pakshaya labu jayagrahanaya wasankota athi bawa ho wani bolanda katha kiyamin kalaya nasthi nokala che. aar. jayawardhana mahatha mathiwarana prathipala nikuth wu da sitama kriyathmaka wuye eelanga mathiwaranaya dinagena thama saha thama pakshaya balayata path wi ema balaya sthawara kota ganima sandaha salasum kirimatayi.

kunuharupa hallak nathuwa mehema deyak karapu eka kochchara deyakda?issara wage nemeyi dan sinhala blog awakashaya.kisidu swayan waranayak nathi, aathma sanyamayak nathi,thamange ho pawule ho gaurawaya gana thakimak nathi, hithena siyaluma awa manushiya hangim kisidu palanayakin thorawa liyana amuthuma kottashayak sinhala blog lowata goda basa athi bawa peni yayi.kunuharupa noliya itha sarthaka blogak kala haki bawata hondama udaharanaya itha janapriya ''thilaka sitha'' blogayi.thama liyu deya nisa idiriyedi thamage daruwan idiriye lajja sithenawanam ewani dewal noliya sitima honda yayi sitheyi.me adahasa piliganima ho nopiliganima thama sathu ayithiyaki.ano profayil ekak athi nisa ano kament kalemi.ado tho kondak athi ekek nam hari namin wara kiya redi karata gena sinha nada kirima oba sathu ayithiyaki.

kathawe liyawunu sundara game thangalla pahalagoda ape ammage maha gedara thamayi ee kale api hitiye.api upadinnath pera 1980 juli warjanayata sahabhagi wima nisa rakiyawa ahimi wunu mage thaththata aayema rakiyawak labenna kochchara kalayak gatha wunada kiyanna mama hariyakarawa dana gena no hitiyath,mata yanthamata mathakayak thiyana kale pawa thaththa wena wena podi bisnas karamin apiwa jiwath kerewuwa.(eewata bisnas kiwwoth api karana eewata monawada kiyanne kiyala bohoma lokuwata oya anshaye randi inna aya mata saththama damawi.)aththatama mata mathakayi papadiye goni pitin patawa gath ratakaju hen walin aran awith, pothu suddha karala podi pakat walata gahala kadawal gane aran gihin damma.ee pakat ekak ru.2.00k witharayi.mama danne naha eyin yanthamata jiwath wenna tharamwath mudalak labunada kiyala.
